text: Shunlin Liang is an aerospace engineer at the University of Maryland, College Park. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to remote sensing from satellite observations. Liang received the Ph.D. degree in remote sensing and GIS from Boston University. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:University of Maryland, College Park faculty Category:Chinese engineers Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Boston University College of Engineering alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shunlin Liang
